sentences.en: A large number of inborn errors of metabolism are known in man.
sentences.cn: 人们了解到在人类中存在大量的先天性代谢缺陷.

sentences.en: And lyrics are tell themselves, inborn I only then must be useful.
sentences.cn: 其中一句歌词是“告诉自己, 天生我才必有用”.

sentences.en: Birds have an inborn ability to fly.
Both parts are so natural with her as if they were inborn.
sentences.cn: 演员——作家,这两种不同的身份,在她的身上融和得这样恰切,仿佛天生来就应该是这样.

sentences.en: Good taste is inborn and cannot be learned.
sentences.cn: 好的鉴赏力是与生俱来的，无法通过后天习得。

sentences.en: He had an inborn talent for languages.
He is a boy with an inborn love of mischief.
sentences.cn: 他是个生来就喜欢恶作剧的男孩子.

sentences.en: He must meet that truth with his own true stuff - with his own inborn strength.
sentences.cn: 他必须用他自己的真实的感情 -- 用他自己的固有力--去面对这种现实.

sentences.en: I believe people are naturally kind, and pursuing happiness an inborn motivation.
sentences.cn: 我相信在自然状态下,人都是善良的, 寻求幸福快乐是人生而具有的动机.

sentences.en: Inborn errors of thyroid hormone biosynthesis leading to goiter are extremely uncommon.
sentences.cn: 甲状腺激素先天性合成异常引起的甲状腺肿极为少见.

sentences.en: It is clear that the ability to smile is inborn.
sentences.cn: 显然，笑的能力是与生俱来的。

sentences.en: John, who is only five, an inborn talent for music.
sentences.cn: 约翰是一外5岁大的孩子, 有着天生的音乐才能.

sentences.en: Mammals have an inborn fear of snakes.
Many methods consist artificial ways to stop dogs inborn character.
sentences.cn: 许多方法包括用人为方式对中止狗天生字符.

sentences.en: The desire for sexual expression is inborn and natural.
sentences.cn: 性表达的渴望是与生俱有、天生而来的.

sentences.en: We have our native inborn talent, yet we hardly use it.
sentences.cn: 我们有天生的才能，但我们却几乎未曾使用过。

sentences.en: When Alfred Adler first postulated in 1908 that there existed an inborn instinct of aggression Freud argued against it.
sentences.cn: 当艾尔弗雷德·阿德勒于1908年首次提出人生来就有攻击性本能的假设时，弗洛伊德对此表示反对。

trans.tran_en: an inborn quality or ability is one you have had naturally since birth
